0.1.name: wordpress/press9-ab-testing
0.1.description:
press9-ab-testing makes calls to press9's API in order to collect data for a running test. No new tables are necessary within Wordpress. Data is tracked in real-time, so you can log into press9 and check the status of a test at any time.

To run a test:

  1. Install and activate the press9-ab-testing plugin
  2. Log into press9formoreoptions.com and click 'Create a test'
  3. Enter the URL of the page you want to test into the Test Designer
  4. Make a HTML or CSS edit and click "Next" when you are done
  5. Copy and paste the generated javascript into the "Test Script" area of the press9-ab-testing administrative panel in wordpress.
  6. Update the "Goal Script" by replacing "GROUP-TOKEN" and "TEST-TOKEN" with the proper tokens.
  7. Select the Test Page(which pages you want to swap the content on) and the Goal Page(which pages you consider a goal)

That's it. To check on a test and
